title: Need information about this logo
content:
Here is the eagle pic u can see here. i am looking for black & white simple solid version of this type of eagle. Where can i get it??? No need to have it exact like same. Similar will also work.

IS THIS RIGHT FORUM TO CREATE THIS TOPIC????

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20090619091809im_/http:/typophile.com/files/police_badge_3787.jpg)
author: artslons

comments.content:
Hi,

this looks like the notorious [Arial](http://web.archive.org/web/20090619091809/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Arial), [squooshed](http://web.archive.org/web/20090619091809/http:/typophile.com/wiki/squooshed). For a better typeface with a similar ‘G’, check out [Univers](http://web.archive.org/web/20090619091809/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Univers).  
F

P.S. No, the right place would have been the Type ID Board: [http://typophile.com/typeid](http://web.archive.org/web/20090619091809/http:/typophile.com/typeid "http://typophile.com/typeid")  
And: [Please use a descriptive title next time! Thank you.](http://web.archive.org/web/20090619091809/http:/typophile.com/forum/typeid/faq/#Q_2 "Frequently Asked Question – What do I enter in the “Title” line?")

I am not asking for font!!!!! I am asking for “black & white simple solid version of this type of eagle”. I think Type ID Board is the to know the font name. I posted it here in design forum as it related with logo.

I would say; draw it..

but if you’re not able too you might want to look around here: [http://www.vectorstock.com/royalty-free-vector/972-heraldry-shield-objec...](http://web.archive.org/web/20090619091809/http:/www.vectorstock.com/royalty-free-vector/972-heraldry-shield-objects-version-1 "http://www.vectorstock.com/royalty-free-vector/972-heraldry-shield-objects-version-1")
I apologize … I misread your request.
Is there any hope to find out answer for this??
Just trace it - it’ll be easier than trying to find the original...

Here’s [one](http://web.archive.org/web/20090619091809/http:/www.tactical-graphic-design.com/download-clipart-files/police-law-enforcement/clip-art-police-eagle-badge.gif) I found using Google... I’m sure there’s more.
